TEXT.TITLE: CORRECTED-ELDER-BEERMAN STORES CORP<ELDR>4TH QTR
TEXT.BODY:
Feb One end
    Oper shr 89 cts vs 1.31 dlrs

    Sales 126.8 mln vs 120.1 mln
    Year

dlrs from reversion of overfunded pension plans.
    Corrects current year operating net.
